title: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
description: A practical guide to building better habits and breaking bad ones through small, consistent changes.

title: Deep Work
author: Cal Newport
description: Explores the benefits of focused work in a distracted world and how to structure your time for maximum impact.

title: Clean Code
author: Robert C. Martin
description: Guidelines and principles for writing readable, maintainable, and efficient code.

title: The Alchemist
author: Paulo Coelho
description: A fable about following your dreams and personal legend through the story of a young shepherd.

title: Mindset
author: Carol S. Dweck
description: Explains fixed vs growth mindset and how our beliefs about talent influence success.

title: Thinking, Fast and Slow
author: Daniel Kahneman
description: Describes two systems of thinking and how they affect decision-making and judgment.

title: Rich Dad Poor Dad
author: Robert Kiyosaki
description: A personal finance classic that contrasts two approaches to money and investing.

title: The Pragmatic Programmer
author: Andrew Hunt, David Thomas
description: Timeless tips and practices for becoming a better, more effective software developer.

title: Can't Hurt Me
author: David Goggins
description: Goggins shares his life story and the mindset strategies he used to push past pain and limits.

title: Start With Why
author: Simon Sinek
description: Explores how leaders inspire action by clearly communicating their purpose and 'why'.

title: The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People
author: Stephen R. Covey
description: Seven principles for personal and interpersonal effectiveness grounded in timeless values.

title: Dune
author: Frank Herbert
description: Epic science fiction saga of politics, religion, and ecology on the desert planet Arrakis.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
author: J.K. Rowling
description: The beginning of Harry's journey into the wizarding world at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

title: The Art of War
author: Sun Tzu
description: Ancient Chinese text on strategy, conflict, and leadership that is still widely applied today.

title: Code Complete
author: Steve McConnell
description: Comprehensive guide to software construction, design, and debugging best practices.
